projectInternalId.description: Identifies the project by internal id

taskCdDesc.description: Identifies the Project task ID and description

visibleInAp.description: If the project task is visible in the Supplier ledger

visibleInAr.description: If the project task is visible in the Customer ledger

visibleInCa.description: If the project task is visible in the Cash management workspace

visibleInCr.description: If the project task is visible in the CRM workspace

visibleInEa.description: If the project task is visible in the Expense workspace

visibleInGl.description: If the project task is visible in the General ledger workspace

visibleInIn.description: If the project task is visible in the Inventory workspace

visibleInPo.description: If the project task is visible in the Purchases workspace

visibleInSo.description: If the project task is visible in the Sales workspace

visibleInTa.description: If the project task is visible in the Time entities workspace

restrictedEmployee.description: Id of the employee where access restrictions apply

restrictedUser.description: Id of the Odp User where access restrictions apply

greaterThanValue.description: Greater than value. The item which is the object for this, varies from API to API.

numberToRead.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

skipRecords.description: This field has been deprecated and will be removed in future versions. Use pagenumber and pagesize for pagination purposes. Pagenumber and pagesize does not work with NumberToRead and SkipRecords.

lastModifiedDateTime.description:
This value, generated by the system, indicates the last time the record was modified. Use it to retrieve all records that have been modified since that time, up to the present.

Accepted format:
* ```yyyy-MM-dd```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.FFF```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss```
* ```yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ss.FFF```

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

lastModifiedDateTimeCondition.description:
This value represents the condition to be applied when retrieving records.

Accepted values (without the single quotes):
* '>' for greater than
* '<' for less than
* '>=' for greater than or equal
* '<=' for less than or equal

_Note:_ __LastModifiedDateTime__ and __LastModifiedDateTimeCondition__ are __mutually inclusive__.

pageSize.description:
Pagination parameter. Number of items to be collected.
Please use a page size lower or equal to the allowed max page size which is returned as part of the metadata information.
If requested page size is greater than allowed max page size, request will be limited to max page size.

erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$ul: **createdDateTime**: Information collected from the system. Not visible on the screen.

**defAccount**: General ledger accounts tab > Default values section > Default account > The account to be used as one of the sources of possible accounts for the invoices and transactions for the project task.
**defAccrualAccount**: General ledger accounts tab > Default values section > Accrual account > The default accrual account to be used in project transactions for the project task.
**defAccrualSub**: General ledger accounts tab > Default values section > Accrual subaccount > The default accrual subaccount to be used in project transactions for the project task.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.

**defSub**: General ledger accounts tab > Default values section > Default subaccount* > The subaccount to be used as one of the sources of possible segment values for subaccounts to be used in the invoices and transactions for the project task.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**description**: Mandatory field: Description > The description of the task.
**employees**: The Employees tab > Information in this tab is retreived from EP203000 (Employees)
**internalId**: Internal ID* > The internal ID of the task.
**projectInternalId**: Project Internal ID* > The internal ID of the project.
**rateTable**: Rate table > The rate table to be used in the allocation rules, if applicable.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.

**restrictEmployees**: Summary tab > Task properties section > Restrict employees > A check box that indicates (if selected) that only the employees listed on the Employees tab of this window can create activities and documents associated with the current task.
**startDate**: Start date > The date when the task was actually started.
**status**: Mandatory field: Status* > The status of the task, which can be one of the following: In planning, Active, Cancelled, Completed.
**taskId**: Mandatory field: > Task ID* > The ID of the task.
**taxCategory**: VAT category > The tax category for the project task.
**visibility**: Information retrieved from the Summary tab
